ca.mymenuapp.ui.activities

Class RestaurantActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ca.mymenuapp.ui.activities.BaseActivity
              • ca.mymenuapp.ui.activities.RestaurantActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener

    public class RestaurantActivity
extends BaseActivity
implements android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    An activity to display a single restaurant. Limitations : menu item images must not be transparent (or contain any transparent pixels, or we can see the list scrolling behind it. todo : sync scrolling todo : handle landscape

      • clamp

        public static float clamp(float value,
          float max,
          float min)
        Standard math clamp method https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clamping_(graphics)
        Parameters:
        value - value to clamp
        max - maximum to return
        min - minimum to return
        Returns:
        min if value < min, max if value > max, else value
